014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.groups;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
018import static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap.toImmutableMap;
019import static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet.toImmutableSet;
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.IgnoreWarnFail;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.InterpolatorFactory;
024import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.TransformerRegistry;
025import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.PropertyDefinition;
026
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.Set;
033
034import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
035import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
036import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
037import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
038import com.google.common.collect.Maps;
039import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
040import org.codehaus.plexus.interpolation.InterpolationException;
041
042public class PropertyGroup {
043
044    /**
045     * Property group id.
046     */
047    String id;
048
049    /**
050     * Activate the group if the current project version does not contain SNAPSHOT. Field injected by Maven.
051     */
052    boolean activeOnRelease = true;
053
054    /**
055     * Activate the group if the current project version contains SNAPSHOT. Field injected by Maven.
056     */
057    boolean activeOnSnapshot = true;
058
059    /**
060     * Action if this property group defines a duplicate property. Field injected by Maven.
061     */
062    private IgnoreWarnFail onDuplicateProperty = IgnoreWarnFail.FAIL;
063
064    public void setOnDuplicateProperty(String onDuplicateProperty) {
065        this.onDuplicateProperty = IgnoreWarnFail.forString(onDuplicateProperty);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Action if any property from that group could not be defined. Field injected by Maven.
070     */
071    private IgnoreWarnFail onMissingProperty = IgnoreWarnFail.FAIL;
072
073    public PropertyGroup setOnMissingProperty(String onMissingProperty) {
074        this.onMissingProperty = IgnoreWarnFail.forString(onMissingProperty);
075        return this;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Property definitions in this group.
080     */
081    Set<PropertyDefinition> propertyDefinitions = Set.of();
082
083    // called by maven
084    public PropertyGroup setProperties(PropertyDefinition... propertyDefinitions) {
085        this.propertyDefinitions = ImmutableSet.copyOf(Arrays.asList(propertyDefinitions));
086
087        this.propertyDefinitions.forEach(PropertyDefinition::check);
088
089        return this;
090    }
091
092    public PropertyGroup() {
093    }
094
095    @VisibleForTesting
096    PropertyGroup(String id) {
097        this.id = id;
098    }
099
100    public String getId() {
101        return id;
102    }
103
104    public boolean isActiveOnRelease() {
105        return activeOnRelease;
106    }
107
108    public boolean isActiveOnSnapshot() {
109        return activeOnSnapshot;
110    }
111
112    public IgnoreWarnFail getOnDuplicateProperty() {
113        return onDuplicateProperty;
114    }
115
116    public IgnoreWarnFail getOnMissingProperty() {
117        return onMissingProperty;
118    }
119
120    public Map<String, String> getProperties() {
121        return propertyDefinitions.stream()
122            .collect(toImmutableMap(PropertyDefinition::getName, PropertyDefinition::getValue));
123    }
124
125    @VisibleForTesting
126    PropertyGroup setProperties(final Map<String, String> properties) {
127        this.propertyDefinitions = properties.entrySet()
128            .stream()
129            .map(e -> new PropertyDefinition(e.getKey(), e.getValue()))
130            .collect(toImmutableSet());
131        return this;
132    }
133
134    public Set<String> getPropertyNames() {
135        return propertyDefinitions.stream()
136            .map(PropertyDefinition::getName)
137            .collect(toImmutableSet());
138    }
139
140    public String getPropertyValue(final InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory, final String propertyName, final Map<String, String> propElements)
141        throws IOException, InterpolationException {
142
143        ImmutableMap<String, PropertyDefinition> definitionMap = Maps.uniqueIndex(propertyDefinitions, PropertyDefinition::getName);
144        final PropertyDefinition propertyDefinition = definitionMap.get(propertyName);
145        checkNotNull(propertyDefinition, "property definition '%s' does not exist!", propertyName);
146
147        return Optional.ofNullable(propertyDefinition.getValue())
148            .map(interpolatorFactory.interpolate(propertyDefinition.getName(), onMissingProperty, propElements))
149            .map(TransformerRegistry.INSTANCE.applyTransformers(propertyDefinition.getTransformers()))
150            .orElse("");
151    }
152
153    public List<PropertyField> createFields(final Map<String, String> values, InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory)
154        throws MojoExecutionException, IOException {
155        checkNotNull(values, "values is null");
156
157        final ImmutableList.Builder<PropertyField> result = ImmutableList.builder();
158        final Map<String, String> properties = getProperties();
159
160        for (String name : properties.keySet()) {
161            try {
162                final String value = getPropertyValue(interpolatorFactory, name, values);
163                result.add(new PropertyField(name, value));
164            } catch (InterpolationException e) {
165                throw new MojoExecutionException(format("Could not interpolate '%s", name), e);
166            }
167        }
168
169        return result.build();
170    }
171}
